thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Richard

author: Richard
title: Richard
text: Noticed my name was auto filled in the second passenger's name instead of my daughters; Immediately called customer service and they would not make the correction. Instead cancelled the complete reservation and had to make a new one to get charged again. At least after much discussion the waived the cancellation fee. I was on the phone for 1:30 minutes. Also, they charged $30 for pre-seat collection automatically without even giving the seat numbers....Very disappointing booking experience. Worst site and experience ever!
